alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 7:19PM MDT until September 21 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BOX ELDER COUNTY... At 719 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Snowville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Snowville, Curlew Junction and Locomotive Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 84 between mile markers 0 and 10. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 71 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
